caseTitle: Allah Dewayo Shahani v. The State through Prosecutor General Sindh
tagline: Under Section 149, PPC, every member of an unlawful assembly stands accountable for committing the crime, provided the said criminal act is perpetrated with a common object or such as every member of the assembly was mindful that such offence is likely to be committed and there must be some nexus between the common object and the offence committed.
